name: Stable++
description: Stable++ is a pioneering decentralized protocol on the Nervos CKB blockchain, built on the RGB++ Layer, which enhances Bitcoin’s scalability and programmability. As the first over-collateralized stablecoin protocol on CKB, Stable++ aims to provide a stable, secure, and permissionless store of value within the Bitcoin ecosystem. Leveraging CKB’s Proof-of-Work (PoW) consensus and Cell model, Stable++ enables users to create and manage stable assets with robust security and interoperability. Backed by the CKB Eco Fund, Stable++ integrates with mainstream Bitcoin wallets like Unisat, OKX, and JoyID, fostering seamless asset management and trading. Launched on testnet in August 2024, Stable++ is poised to drive DeFi innovation by offering a scalable, Bitcoin-native stablecoin solution.

highlights.title: First Over-Collateralized Stablecoin
highlights.description: Stable++ introduces the first decentralized, over-collateralized stablecoin protocol on CKB, ensuring stability and trustlessness within the Bitcoin ecosystem

highlights.title: RGB++ Layer Integration
highlights.description: Built on the RGB++ protocol, Stable++ enhances Bitcoin’s smart contract capabilities, enabling secure and scalable stablecoin issuance and transactions

faq.a: Stable++ uses CKB’s PoW consensus and Cell model, combined with the RGB++ protocol, to issue and manage stablecoins backed by over-collateralized assets, ensuring stability and security.

faq.q: Which wallets are compatible with Stable++?
faq.a: Stable++ supports mainstream Bitcoin wallets like Unisat, OKX, and JoyID, allowing users to interact with the protocol seamlessly.
By using an over-collateralized model, Stable++ ensures stablecoin value is backed by excess collateral, reducing volatility and enhancing trust.

faq.q: What is the purpose of Stable++’s stablecoin?
faq.a: Stable++ aims to provide a stable, decentralized store of value for DeFi applications, trading, and asset management within the Bitcoin and CKB ecosystems.
